abstract: In a move that would mark a departure for Google’s marketing efforts, the company is expected to air an ad during the Super Bowl.
snippet: In a move that would mark a departure for Google’s marketing efforts, the company is expected to air an ad during the Super Bowl.
lead_paragraph: Updated 6:52 PM Confirming Google is running ad to promote its brand during the Super BowlOver the weekend, the tech blogosphere was abuzz over the expectation that Google, a company that build its brand almost entirely through word of mouth, was going to air an ad during the Super Bowl. John Battelle, the author of “The Search,” the 2005 book about Google, wrote on his blog that “Google plans to hit the branded advertising big leagues this Sunday,” citing an unnamed source.

headline.main: Is Google Running a Super Bowl Ad?
